hero.lead1: EXPLORE BÚZIOS AT YOUR OWN PACE!
hero.lead2: RENT YOUR CAR AND LIVE AN UNFORGETTABLE ADVENTURE.
hero.description: Do you dream of exploring the beautiful beaches of Búzios with complete freedom? We have the perfect solution for you! Rent a car and discover every corner of this Rio paradise at your own pace.

regular.metaDescription: Shared regular transfer between Búzios and Rio de Janeiro. US$ 150 per person including luggage.

hero.description: It's a shared transfer with other people where departure, delay and arrival times are determined by the company.
hero.price: The cost is US$ 150 per person, including luggage.

transferOut.title: TRANSFER OUT SERVICE BÚZIOS X RIO
transferOut.hotels: HOTELS — We only disembark in Copacabana, Leblon and Ipanema upon presentation of the client's hotel reservation before the reservation.
transferOut.airport: AIRPORT — Only with flight number and departure time.

transferIn.title: TRANSFER IN SERVICE RIO X BÚZIOS
transferIn.hotels: HOTELS and INNS — Located only on the main road Av. José Bento Ribeiro Dantas and surroundings. Does not make arrivals at private residences, nor small streets or with high elevations.
transferIn.alternative: If you cannot stop at specific hotels or inns, make a stop on nearby streets.

private.title: Private Transfer
private.metaDescription: Exclusive private transfer between Búzios and Rio de Janeiro with maximum comfort and flexibility.

hero.copyLine1: We go to all regions of Rio de Janeiro, we check availability for São Paulo, Salvador and Bahia, Minas Gerais, etc.

about.title: About the service
about.paragraph: It's a private transfer where only the contractor and the people chosen by them travel. The departure time is defined by the contractor. Value from Búzios to Rio and vice versa starting from US$ 600 per leg for up to 4 passengers, including 2 bags of 30 kg and 2 of 10 kg per leg. For more people and/or more luggage, please consult.

flight.title: If you have a flight
flight.b1: We recommend leaving at least 6 hours before the flight time to avoid delays.
flight.b2: Since the time is defined by the passenger, the company is not responsible for missed flights.
flight.b3: Provide flight number so we can track possible changes.

booking.title: Reservations
booking.p: Services available upon 100% advance payment and sending flight information via WhatsApp. After the form, we will contact you to confirm availability and details.
